Bitdevs Interior de São Paulo
Eventos Meetup
==============================================================================================================================================================

Seminário Socrático 007

27 Nov 2024 Link to Meetup

Anúncios

Este meetup será focado em discussões técnicas profundas sobre o desenvolvimento do Bitcoin. Agradecemos à Scalar School pelo apoio na organização do evento.

Para continuar seus estudos e interagir com a comunidade, junte-se ao Discord da Scalar School

Siga-nos no X: Bitdevs Interior

House Rules

Este evento será realizado sob a Chatham House Rule. Isso significa que todos os participantes são encorajados a compartilhar as informações discutidas, mas sem revelar a identidade de quem disse o quê. Respeite a privacidade dos participantes. Por favor, não tire fotos sem a permissão.

Bitcoin Core & Development

  • Bitcoin Core 28.0 Released
  • Bitcoin Core 28 wallet integration guide
  • Bitcoin consensus analysis project (BCAP)
  • Disclosure of hindered block propagation due to stalling peers
  • Public disclosure of three vulnerabilities affecting Bitcoin Core <v25.0

Mining

  • Stratum v2 Project Roadmap
  • DATUM protocol announced

Security, Vulnerabilities & Risk Management

  • Payment Censorship in the Lightning Network Despite Encrypted Communication
  • CVE-2024-38365 public disclosure (btcd FindAndDelete bug)
  • Is Tor still safe to use?
  • Attack on Tor Network
  • Slow Block Validation Attacks
  • Disclosure of CVE-2024-35202
  • Bloating of Testnet 4 UTXO set

Cryptography & Post-Quantum Topics

  • Post-quantum Bitcoin Script and signatures
  • ColliderScript: Covenants in Bitcoin via 160-bit hash collisions
  • Adaptors generalized
  • BIP: DLEQ

New Proposals & Improvements

  • SuperScalar: Laddered Timeout-Tree-Structured Decker-Wattenhofer Factories
  • A fast, scalable protocol for resolving lightning payments
  • BIP327: update status from Draft to Active

Lightning Protocol & Layer-2 Improvements

  • Re-broadcast channel_announcements every six blocks for a week
  • Add support for RBF-ing splice transactions
  • Include invoice requests in async payment onions
  • Serialize blinded Trampoline hops

Wallets, User Experience & New Proposals

  • Bitcoin PIPEs: Covenants on Bitcoin Without Soft Fork
  • A novel design for smartphone-based bitcoin wallets
  • Cashu: Tap to pay with bearer tokens - absolute wild!
  • Blue Wallet enables multi-recipient transactions
  • BTCPay Server 2.0: our biggest update yet!
  • Libbitcoin for Core people

Other Topics of Interest

  • BRC20 Pinning Attack
  • CAT Protocol
  • Blockstream Secures $210M Led by Fulgur Ventures to Drive Layer-2 Growth
  • Libbitcoin syncs full blockchain in 1 hour
